title: Anti-rheumatoid arthritis effects of Caragana acanthophylla Kom. on collagen-induced arthritis and the anti-inflammatory activity of polyphenols as main active components.
abstract: Caragana acanthophylla Kom. is a folk medicine for treating rheumatoid arthritis (RA), widely used in Xinjiang of China. However, the pharmacological mechanism and possible material basis was not clear.
